EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed: Paris Air Show 2019 - Honeywell Brunch, June 16, 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Your registration has been confirmed for the Paris Air Show 2019 Honeywell Brunch. Please save this email for future reference.
Event: Paris Air Show 2019 - Honeywell Brunch Date: Sunday, June 16, 2019 Time: 11am - 2pm Location: Le Pré Catelan – Salons Bois de Boulogne, Route de la Grande Cascade, 75000 Paris
Please contact us at aero.marketing@honeywell.com <[[mailto:aero.marketing@honeywell.com]]> with any questions. We look forward to meeting you during our event.
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Event Team
